title: MirroringDeviceSettings
description: This element holds the Setting applied to a Mirror used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference (the ID attribute) to the Mirror in question.

subCategoriesOrder.MirroringDeviceSettings: This element holds the Setting applied to a Mirror used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference (the ID attribute) to the Mirror in question.

ID.description: This is the Unique Identifier of the device used in this case.

ActualMountedAngle.description: This field records the Angle at which this mirror was mounted during the Acqusition of this Channel with respect to the optical axis.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
